AcClimate!

The climate has been changing for many years, yet us humans still haven't acclimated to the modern day. Using AcClimate, share your contributions to the environment with a like minded community at UCSD!

How is the UCSD community contributing to the environment? How are YOU contributing to the environment?

Post Go To Feed Weekly Climate Update!

Stop worrying.
Start acting.

Its bad.

The current state of affairs with climate change is horrible. Period. At the current rate of human consumption and carelessness our environment's future looks bleak. .

Too Little Action

If more people would contribute a miniscule portion of their time to helping with climate change, we can turn things around environment wise. But all people seem to do is worry...

AcClimate's Purpose

We have to take small, underwhelming steps to combat this momentum of climate destructiveness. AcClimate helps to motivate people to take action by forming a community of like-minded individuals interested in reversing climate change and providing recognition for people's contributions to the environment, no matter how small.

Why UCSD?

We can only take small steps to reverse climate change, and we would like to test AcClimate's impact on a small sample size initially. As the app expands, so will AcClimate's population reach.

"How do we break this vicious cycle[climate destruction]? By sharing the right kind of information, not information about the global problem that seems far away in space and time but information about the local issues"
Katharine Hayhoe / Climate Scientist
No BS, get informed!
Sign up for tailored, weekly climate change news with the latest updates!
